text: Lady Jennifer is a 1908 novel by the British writer John Strange Winter. It was adapted into a 1915 British silent film of the same title starring Harry Royston.Goble p.506 ==References== ==Bibliography== * Goble, Alan. The Complete Index to Literary Sources in Film. Walter de Gruyter, 1999. Category:1908 British novels Category:Novels set in England Category:Novels by John Strange Winter Category:British novels adapted into films
title: Lady Jennifer (novel)
